description: Exports your boards and users to a ZIP-Archive to migrate them to Homarr after version 1.0.0

securityNote.title: Security Note
securityNote.text: When exporting users and integrations it will also open a modal with an encryption key. This key is required to import the data into Homarr. Keep it safe and do not share it with anyone.

form.label: Select everything you want to export

integrations.label: Export integrations
integrations.description: This will include encrypted credentials for integrations. Only available when exporting boards

users.label: Export users
users.description: This will only export credential users, passwords hash and salt are encrypted

modal.title: Encryption key
modal.description: Your data has been exported. Keep this key safe and do not share it with anyone. You will need this key to import the data into Homarr.
